policyFaqs.question: Do work from office schedules follow adequate social distancing within CDC guideline requirements?
policyFaqs.answer: All employees are instructed to maintain at least six feet distance from each other and any third parties. Employees who need to sneeze or cough should use a cloth or tissue. Do not shake hands or engage in any unnecessary physical contact with any otherindividuals at the work site.
